catalyst: The catalyst used in the experiment is MoS2/Bi2WO6 nanocomposites.
light source: A 300 W Xe arc lamp (PLS-SXE300) equipped with an ultraviolet cutoff filter (420 nm) was positioned 5 cm above from the reactor as a light resource.
lamp: The lamp used in the experiment is a 300 W Xe arc lamp (PLS-SXE300) equipped with an ultraviolet cutoff filter (420 nm).
reaction medium: The reaction medium used in the experiment includes pure water, Na2CO3 aqueous solution, and NaHCO3 aqueous solution.
